Crush.help: You are being Crushed. You are Immobilized, taking Smashing Damage over Time, and cannot Fly.
Crush.targetHelp: You are being Crushed. You are Immobilized, taking Smashing Damage over Time, and cannot Fly.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage over time.

Lift.help: Negates the gravity around a single target. Lift violently sends an enemy straight into the air, then slams him to the ground for Smashing damage. This power can bring flying foes to the ground. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

messages.attackerHit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

Propel.help: The Hero can open up a portal and pull in a heavy object that her can then levitate and propel at foes!
Propel.targetHelp: The Hero can open up a portal and pull in a heavy object that her can then levitate and propel at foes!

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

messages.attackerHit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

Transfusion.help: Transfusion drains an enemy of some Endurance and reduces the target's Regeneration rate, and transfers that energy, in the form of Hit Points, to all allies near the affected foe. You can use Transfusion to heal yourself as well as your allies. Recharge: Moderate
Transfusion.targetHelp: Your Regeneration rate has been reduced.

Siphon_Speed.help: The Hero has Siphoned your speed and reduced your damage potential to increase its own.
Siphon_Speed.targetHelp: The Hero has Siphoned your speed and reduced your damage potential to increase its own.

Crushing_Field.help: Creates a large gravitational field strong enough to Immobilize multiple foes. Crushing Field can also bring down flying entities. Slower and less damaging than Crush, but can capture multiple targets. Crushing Field deals Smashing damage over time and can Slow the movement of targets that escape its grasp. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Moderate
Crushing_Field.shortHelp: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Minor DoT(Smash), Foe Immobilize, -Fly
Crushing_Field.targetHelp: You are being Crushed. You cannot move or fly.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage over time.

Siphon_Power.help: The Hero has Siphoned your power and reduced your damage potential to strengthen his own.
Siphon_Power.targetHelp: The Hero has Siphoned your power and reduced your damage potential to strengthen his own.

Singularity.help: You can create a very powerful Gravitational Singularity. The Singularity will engage your foes, assaulting them with various gravity powers. Any foes that attempt to approach the Singularity will be violently hurled away. The Singularity cannot be healed, but is highly resistant to all forms of damage and nearly impervious to Controlling type powers. Recharge: Very Long
